005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
011
012import java.util.Collection;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
016
017public interface IGroupable extends IInstance {
018
019  int DEFAULT_GROUP_AS_MIN_OCCURS = 0;
020  int DEFAULT_GROUP_AS_MAX_OCCURS = 1;
021  @NonNull
022  JsonGroupAsBehavior DEFAULT_JSON_GROUP_AS_BEHAVIOR = JsonGroupAsBehavior.SINGLETON_OR_LIST;
023  @NonNull
024  XmlGroupAsBehavior DEFAULT_XML_GROUP_AS_BEHAVIOR = XmlGroupAsBehavior.UNGROUPED;
025
026  /**
027   * Get the minimum cardinality for this associated instance. This value must be
028   * less than or equal to the maximum cardinality returned by
029   * {@link #getMaxOccurs()}.
030   *
031   * @return {@code 0} or a positive integer value
032   * @see #DEFAULT_GROUP_AS_MIN_OCCURS
033   */
034  int getMinOccurs();
035
036  /**
037   * Get the maximum cardinality for this associated instance. This value must be
038   * greater than or equal to the minimum cardinality returned by
039   * {@link #getMinOccurs()}, or {@code -1} if unbounded.
040   *
041   * @return a positive integer value or {@code -1} if unbounded
042   * @see #DEFAULT_GROUP_AS_MAX_OCCURS
043   */
044  int getMaxOccurs();
045
046  /**
047   * Get the name provided for grouping. An instance in Metaschema must have a
048   * group name if the instance has a cardinality greater than {@code 1}.
049   *
050   * @return the group-as name or {@code null} if no name is configured, such as
051   *         when {@link #getMaxOccurs()} = 1
052   */
053  @Nullable
054  default String getGroupAsName() {
055    // no group-as by default
056    return null;
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Get the name used for the associated element wrapping a collection of
061   * elements in XML. This value is required when {@link #getXmlGroupAsBehavior()}
062   * = {@link XmlGroupAsBehavior#GROUPED}. This name will be the element name
063   * wrapping a collection of elements.
064   * <p>
065   * If this instance doesn't have a namespace defined, then the module's XML
066   * namespace will be used.
067   *
068   * @return the groupAs QName or {@code null} if no name is configured, such as
069   *         when {@link #getMaxOccurs()} = 1.
070   */
071  @Nullable
072  default IEnhancedQName getEffectiveXmlGroupAsQName() {
073    return XmlGroupAsBehavior.GROUPED.equals(getXmlGroupAsBehavior())
074        ? IEnhancedQName.of(
075            getContainingDefinition().getQName().getNamespace(),
076            ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(getGroupAsName()))
077        : null;
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Gets the configured JSON group-as strategy. A JSON group-as strategy is only
082   * required when {@link #getMaxOccurs()} &gt; 1.
083   * <p>
084   * The default for this method is {@link JsonGroupAsBehavior#NONE}, since the
085   * default behavior is to have no grouping. If {@link #getMaxOccurs()} is
086   * greater than {@code 1}, then the default behavior is
087   * {@code #DEFAULT_JSON_GROUP_AS_BEHAVIOR}.
088   *
089   * @return the JSON group-as strategy, or {@code JsonGroupAsBehavior#NONE} if
090   *         {@link #getMaxOccurs()} = 1
091   * @see #DEFAULT_JSON_GROUP_AS_BEHAVIOR
092   */
093  @NonNull
094  default JsonGroupAsBehavior getJsonGroupAsBehavior() {
095    return JsonGroupAsBehavior.NONE;
096  }
097
098  /**
099   * Gets the configured XML group-as strategy. A XML group-as strategy is only
100   * required when {@link #getMaxOccurs()} &gt; 1.
101   *
102   * @return the JSON group-as strategy, or {@code XmlGroupAsBehavior#UNGROUPED}
103   *         if {@link #getMaxOccurs()} = 1
104   * @see #DEFAULT_XML_GROUP_AS_BEHAVIOR
105   */
106  @NonNull
107  default XmlGroupAsBehavior getXmlGroupAsBehavior() {
108    return DEFAULT_XML_GROUP_AS_BEHAVIOR;
109  }
110
111  /**
112   * Get the item values for the provided {@code instanceValue}. An instance may
113   * be singular or many valued.
114   *
115   * @param instanceValue
116   *          the instance
117   * @return the item values or an empty collection if no item values exist
118   */
119  @NonNull
120  default Collection<?> getItemValues(@NonNull Object instanceValue) {
121    // no item values by default
122    return CollectionUtil.emptyList();
123  }
124}
